content: this hood is worked from the bottom up both in the round and flat sizes s m l shown in size m finished measurements height 19½ circumference 23¼ 24¼ 25½ materials premier® yarns elle by me odette 23% polyester 22% alpaca 22% superwash merino 15% acrylic 18% metalized polyester 3 5oz/100g 328yds/300m el7005-07 lichen 1 ball all sizes needle us size 9 5 5 mm 16 circular and set of dpns or extra needle and us size 8 5 mm 16 circular or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle stitch marker gauge 14½ sts x 24 row = 4 in st st save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern knit and purl stitches k2tog ssk and sk2p decreases knitting small circumferences in the round picking up stitches and knitting three needle bind off
